body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Restaurants              Restaurants           To access this list, please click on the picture. Greater Cincinnati Convention & Visitors Bureau  While the park has no dining facilities or vending machines, visitors to William Howard Taft NHS can explore the Greater Cincinnati area and discover myriad food options that are sure to please everyone's palate.  From fast food to upscale dining, the Greater Cincinnati area has it all!
title: William Howard Taft National Historic Site: Restaurants
